summary: A Joseon dynasty bounty hunter becomes the body guard of the queen he secretly loves.
cast: Seung-woo Cho|Soo Ae|Sophie Broustal|Ho-jin Chun|Jae-woong Choi|Kim Young-Min|Min-hee Park|Su-hee Go|Hee-yeon Song|Yong-nyeo Lee|Yeong-bae Yun|Man-dae Bong|Joo-sil Lee|So-hee Kim|Jun-myeong Lee|Geum-Seong Kil|Moo-Saeng Lee|Yeong-jae Kwak|Hee-jeong Lee|Sin-jong Kang|Seung-in Seo|Moo-yeong Yeo|Seon-geun Son|Seong-hwan Joo|Cheol-jin Shin|Jeong-wu Song|Jae-jin Baek|Nak-jun Lee|Kyeong-won Choi|Seon-hwa Kim|Hyo-jeong Kang|Hong Lee|Min-hee Kim|Hyun-ah Kim|Yeong-geol Yun|In-gu Heo|Jae-seop Choi|Hanssen Jeon|Myeong-du Kim|Jong-yeol Jeong|Ha-seok Jo|Kang-il Kim|Seol-gu Lee|Hiromitsu Takeda|Kenichi Yoshimura|Chang-gon Song|Ho Lim|Seol-hee Yun|Jong-ryol Choi|Joo-Hee Yoon|Dae-hyeon Lee|Jang-hoon Ahn|Ok-joo Yoo|Eung-soo No|Hyeon-seung Sin|Soo-jeong Kim|Tae-kyeong Park|Hyun-Jeong Kim|So-hyeon Park|Seo-yeong Heo|Ji-na Kim|James Kneafsey|Jason-Patrick Taylor|Terri Doty|Ha-Suk Jo|Se-hyeong Ki|Sang-Hun Lee|Iakov Missyuris|Jin-won Seo|Ji-woong Wi|Richard L. title: Bool-kkott-cheo-reom na-bi-cheo-reom
